    • detectMarkerRun

      public DetectMarkerPipeline.MarkerLocation detectMarkerRun()
      This method waits until the search for the marker is done, and then it return the marker location. It waits until the marker is found, then it returns the marker location.
      Returns:
      Where the marker is
